Articles.Content:
I am a newcomer to texturing, and I have a question. I did a smart UV unwrap, and then edited the picture in photoshop. Applied in blender, it looks like this:

Very simple. However, in KSP, it looks like this:

Clearly, the textures do not match up. What am I doing wrong?

Make sure you\'ve applied scale and rotation (in object mode, selected everything and press Ctrl+A). I\'m not sure if you\'ll need to re-do the UV unwrap after that. Also make sure your face normals are all pointing out of the mesh.
